prompt: Can you recommend the best video translator extension for YouTube?

metadata.generated_search_query: best video translator extension for YouTube browser extension translate YouTube captions subtitles

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some of the most effective YouTube video translation extensions (mostly Chrome/Edge) you can install to translate subtitles or audio in real time ‚Äî with pros/cons: ‚≠ê Strong Picks for YouTube Translation 1) TransParrot ‚Äì YouTube Translate & Dual Subtitles AI-powered subtitle translation with dual/bilingual captions. Includes text-to-speech to listen to translations. Good language flexibility and readability. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: Video CC translator - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Translate Udemy, YouTube, and Udacity video lectures into your preferred language! This extension automatically translates subtitles (Closed Captions, CC) in real-time using Google Translate and DeepL.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 2) Video CC Translator Automatically translates YouTube subtitles in real time using Google Translate/DeepL. Works on YouTube and some educational platforms. Simple and reliable for subtitle translation. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: HoverTranslate - YouTube Subtitle Translator - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Translate YouTube subtitles from any language to your native one. ‚Ä¢ Auto Language Detection: The extension automatically detects the subtitle language - start learning immediately! ‚Ä¢ Multiple Translators: Choose between Google Translate and Bing Translator for the most accurate vocabulary translations.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) HoverTranslate ‚Äì YouTube Subtitle Translator Translate subtitles by hovering over words, great if you want to learn language while watching. Auto language detection, supports many languages. More learning-focused than full auto-translate. Chrome Web Store

4) Language Reactor (formerly LLN) Not a pure ‚Äútranslator‚Äù extension, but enhances YouTube with dual subtitles and interactive translation tools. Useful if you‚Äôre watching for language learning or detailed comprehension. Wikipedia

sources.title: TranslateTube: YouTube Video Translator - Chrome Web Store
sources.snippet: Install the extension 2. Open any YouTube video or live stream 3. Select your preferred language 4. Choose translation mode: Voice dubbing or subtitles 5. Click "Start" - translation begins immediately üåü Key Features: 1. YouTube Video Translator - Convert any video to your language 2. Auto-Translate - Works automatically with one click 3.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 5) TranslateTube: YouTube Video Translator Offers AI voice dubbing + subtitles, so you get spoken translation as well. Useful for videos without existing captions, but less polished than others and limited reviews. Chrome Web Store

sources.title: 4 Best YouTube Subtitle Translator Chrome Extensions
sources.snippet: These extensions offer features like audio translation, dual subtitles, and AI-based language translations for the captions. Recommended: Use Built-In Captions Translator

citation_mappings.claim_text: Alternatives / Niche Tools YouTube built-in Auto-Translate: YouTube itself lets you auto-translate captions (no extension required) by enabling CC ‚Üí Auto-translate ‚Äî works well for simple cases. Guiding Tech

sources.title: AI Video Translator with Real-Time Bilingual Subtitles | Immersive ...
sources.snippet: The web version of Immersive Translate supports video translation via pasted YouTube links and X post links. The extension version enables real-time bilingual subtitles and subtitle-free translation across 60+ global online video platforms.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Immersive Translate (extension + web tool): Can generate and translate subtitles even if none exist, with customizable bilingual subtitles. Immersive Translate
